name: Indie Game Developer
description:
"Indie Developer" is a SIM game, you are an indie game developer, through your own efforts to develop excellent games, finally, you will get millions of faithful supporters of the game, leading the game market.

All - round Developers
The game started in the following occupations need to choose one: planning, procedures, art, but in the course of the game can continue to enhance all aspects of ability, and ultimately realize the all-round developer's dream.

Developing Games
A total of 29 kinds of game background and 18 kinds of game types for you to choose, enjoy the development of your favorite game. In addition, you can choose to plagiarism, micro-innovation or innovative way to develop.

Gaming Platform
When the game is released, the App Store and multiple platforms will rate your game, and if the rating is good, it may be recommended.

Share Results
When you develop a good game, you can share to friends.
